class.name: MultivariateSummaryStatisticsTest

javadoc.text: Test cases for the {@link MultivariateSummaryStatistics} class.

method.name: testShuffledStatistics
method.comment: the purpose of this test is only to check the get/set methods
we are aware shuffling statistics like this is really not
something sensible to do in production ...

javadoc.text: Bogus mean implementation to test setter injection. * Returns the sum instead of the mean.

method.name: testEqualsAndHashCode
method.comment: Add data in same order to t
Clear and make sure summaries are indistinguishable from empty summary
